general.name: General NOC
general.description: Balanced mix of system, application, infrastructure, and security alerts typical of a general-purpose NOC environment

finserv.name: Financial Services
finserv.description: Security and compliance-focused alerts typical of banking, fintech, and regulated financial institutions
finserv.target_audience: Banks, payment processors, financial technology companies
finserv.severity_focus: Higher proportion of medium/high severity alerts

saas.name: Software-as-a-Service
saas.description: Application performance and scalability alerts typical of cloud platforms and SaaS providers
saas.target_audience: Cloud platforms, DevOps teams, SaaS companies
saas.severity_focus: Balanced with focus on application performance

industrial.name: Industrial/OT
industrial.description: Infrastructure and operational technology alerts typical of manufacturing, utilities, and industrial IoT
industrial.target_audience: Manufacturing plants, utilities, industrial IoT deployments
industrial.severity_focus: Higher proportion of high severity infrastructure alerts

notes: Profiles affect alert category distribution and severity weighting
Special alerts are industry-specific and only appear in relevant profiles
All profiles generate the same data quality and AI insights
Profiles help demonstrate AetherLink's adaptability to different environments
